rules: NO GRADIENTS. Use solid colors only.
Gold (#D4AF37) is used for Actions (Buttons), Borders, and Highlights.
Text on Gold backgrounds must be Black (#000000) for contrast.
Never use white backgrounds. Even cards must be dark (#121212).

usage.h1: text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold tracking-tight text-white font-heading
usage.label: text-xs uppercase tracking-widest text-[#D4AF37] font-body

typography.import_instruction: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;500;700&family=Playfair+Display:wght@400;700&display=swap');

layout.grid_system: Mobile-first. Use 'container mx-auto px-4' for main content.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black hover:bg-[#B5952F] rounded-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-wide transition-all duration-300 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(212,175,55,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#D4AF37] text-[#D4AF37] hover:bg-[#D4AF37] hover:text-black rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wide transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-black border border-[#D4AF37]/50 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 focus:border-[#D4AF37] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#D4AF37] rounded-sm h-12

navigation.mobile_nav: fixed bottom-0 w-full bg-[#121212] border-t border-[#D4AF37]/20 flex justify-around py-4 z-50
navigation.desktop_sidebar: hidden md:flex flex-col w-64 bg-[#121212] border-r border-[#D4AF37]/20 h-screen fixed left-0 top-0

map.style: Use Leaflet with a Dark Matter tile layer (e.g., CartoDB Dark Matter) to match the black theme. CSS filter: grayscale(100%) invert(100%) contrast(90%) if needed for OSM standard tiles.

visual_enhancers.borders: Use thin, crisp borders. 1px solid #D4AF37 with low opacity (20-30%) for structure.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Glow effects instead of drop shadows. shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(212,175,55,0.15)]
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise texture overlay on the background is allowed to add 'film grain' luxury feel.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px. Color: #D4AF37.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'frontend/src/index.css' immediately.
3. TAILWIND: Update 'frontend/tailwind.config.js' to include the custom colors (gold: #D4AF37) and fonts.
5. MAPS: Implement OpenStreetMap using 'react-leaflet'. FORCE DARK MODE on the map using CSS filters or a dark tile provider.
6. FORMS: Use Shadcn Form + React Hook Form. Style inputs to be black with gold borders.
7. PWA: Ensure 'manifest.json' exists and service worker is registered.
8. NOTIFICATIONS: Use 'sonner' for toast notifications (Gold border, black bg).
9. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js or .jsx for all React files. NO TypeScript (.ts/.tsx).
10. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, prefer solid darks for this brand.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...).
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...}).
